title: Galaxy Watch 4 update brings interval target feature, sleep coaching, and improved body composition insights
content:
Ahead of the Galaxy S22 series launch, Samsung has announced a new software update for the Galaxy Watch 4 series, bringing enhanced health features and customizations. The latest software update for the Galaxy Watch 4 and Galaxy Watch 4 Classic adds advanced interval training for cyclists and runners, a sleep coaching program, and new body

The post Galaxy Watch 4 update brings interval target feature, sleep coaching, and improved body composition insights appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest software update for the Galaxy Watch 4 and Galaxy Watch 4 Classic adds interval target features, sleep coaching program and more.
